explains: n. 喧闹，斗殴，闹事；布劳尔舞
v. 打斗，闹事，大声争吵；（诗、文）小溪哗哗地流

sentences.en: He had been in a drunken street brawl.
sentences.cn: 他曾参与了一场街头醉酒斗殴。

sentences.en: He was killed in a brawl, somewhere about midsummer.
sentences.cn: 他是在仲夏前后的一次斗殴中被打死的。

sentences.en: His uncle Tommy once took on three men together in a brawl.
sentences.cn: 他的叔叔汤米有一次和三个人打架。
